name: Awakened Biokinetic
description: Control over bodily processes, biokinetics move just a little too smothly and gracefully.

name: Awakened Clairsentient
description: Extending the senses beyond the body, clairsentients always seem to be looking at something no one else can see.

name: Awakened Pyrokinetic
description: The direct control of heat and fire, pyrokinetics tend to volatile and sometimes unstable.

name: Awakened Telepath
description: The reading of other's minds, telepaths seem to struggle not to finish others' sentences.

name: Awakened Telekinetic
description: Moving objects and people at a distance, telekinetics are always fidgeting.

name: Awakened Teleporter
description: Moving without crossing the intervening space, teleporters can never be in the same place for long.

name: Awakened Vitakinetic
description: Control of health and vitality, vitakinetics make everyone else look sickly.
